name: Euphoric
description:
#3
When I exploring the forest in Bukit Lawang, I look at this girl, she's one of a daughter wood cutter in there, and she's waiting her dad to come from inside the forest, no one friends, no one accompany her at that time,
and she's usually doing this almost single time, when her mother take care her brother at home.
your mom carrying you since she pregnant til you born until you mature, or maybe until you got married,
but if you realize the first person sobbed at that moment its your father,
the first person give you a food even if you notice actually he hasn't eat yet, the first person who teaching you how to bike, how to walk, how to read, how to count and more.
so I have words for this,
to all happily father out there, give you courage, give your time for your childs cause the moment when you see their face when they sleep, their little finger dancing around your hand never repeat again on your life, never came back even you want it so badly.

Best regards,
one of the father that mention above
